this.setState({query:event.target.value}) } loadData = async () => { let session = await this.driver.session({database:"gameofthrones"}); let res = await session.run(this.state.query); session.close(); console.log(res); let nodes = new Set(); let links = res.records.map(r => { let source = r.get("source"); let target = r.get("target"); nodes.add(source); nodes.add(target); return {source, target}}); nodes = Array.from(nodes).map(name => {return {name}}); this.setState({ data : {nodes, links}}); } render() { return (
